name: clintSVR
short_description: The clintSVR is a server program for Avaya CMS real time data. It uses a tool called clint to retrieve real time data from Avaya CMS and provides API(s) for real time data application development and integration. The clintSVR retrieves CMS real time reports at an interval that specified by you, it stores the real time data in memory and allows multiple programs or applications access them via REST, OCX and C/C++ interfaces. Moreover, it supports connection with XMPP server so you can display reports via XMPP client. The clintSVR can write real time data to Splunk which enables you to create  dashboard reports.
summary: Access Avaya CMS realtime data via REST, OCX and C/C++ API

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux
